CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the resulting polymers were investigated with a conventional device structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS ( 40 nm ) / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M ( 8^0 n m ) / p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] ( PFN ) ( 5 nm ) / Al ( 100 nm ) , here a thin layer of PFN was employed as the cathode interlayer since it can improve the electron extraction.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide)
2. PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))
3. PSS (Poly(styrene sulfonate))
4. polymer (unspecified)
5. PC7BM (Poly[7,7'-bis(10-phenyl-9-anthryl)phenylene vinylene])
6. PFN (unspecified)
7. Al (Aluminum)

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. ITO
2. PEDOT
3. PSS
4. polymer
5. PC7BM
6. PFN
7. Al

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the resulting polymers were investigated with a conventional device structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS ( 40 nm ) / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M ( 8^0 n m ) / p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] ( PFN ) ( 5 nm ) / Al ( 100 nm ) , here a thin layer of PFN was employed as the cathode interlayer since it can improve the electron extraction.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) - a material used in the device structure as a transparent conductive layer.
2. PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)) - a conducting polymer used in the device structure.
3. PSS (Poly(styrene sulfonate)) - a material used in the device structure as a binder.
4. polymer (Poly(9,9-dioctylfluorene)) - a material used in the device structure as a charge-transporting layer.
5. PC7BM (Poly[7,7-bis(1-naphthyl)-2,10-phenanthroline]) - a material used in the device structure as a charge-transporting layer.
6. PFN (Poly[9,9-bis(3-methylphenyl)fluorene]) - a material used in the device structure as a cathode interlayer.
7. Al (Aluminum) - a material used in the device structure as an electrode.

These are the "Property Value" entities mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)) - a material used in the device structure as a conducting polymer.
2. PSS (Poly(styrene sulfonate)) - a material used in the device structure as a binder.
3. PC7BM (Poly[7,7-bis(1-naphthyl)-2,10-phenanthroline]) - a material used in the device structure as a charge-transporting layer.
4. PFN (Poly[9,9-bis(3-methylphenyl)fluorene]) - a material used in the device structure as a cathode interlayer.

These are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)) |
| PSS (Poly(styrene sulfonate)) |
| PC7BM (Poly[7,7-bis(1-naphthyl)-2,10-phenanthroline]) |
| PFN (Poly[9,9-bis(3-methylphenyl)fluorene]) |
